name: e-commerce-prototype
description:
- ReactJS
+ Redux toolkit
+ React router dom
+ React loading skeleton
+ Custom hooks
- CSS modules
- NodeJS
- ExpressJS

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-frontend
scripts.start: npm run start-server & npm run start-frontend
scripts.watch: npm run watch-server & npm run start-frontend

author: Oussama EL BACHIRI
